title: Important Update: Online Assessment Test for ICAI NBFC Certificate Course on December 20, 2025
content:
# Important Update: Online Assessment Test for ICAI NBFC Certificate Course on December 20, 2025

Ek important update hai for all CA professionals pursuing the Certificate Course on Non-Banking Financial Companies (NBFCs). The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne Online Assessment Test (AT) ke schedule ko announce kiya hai.

Here are the key details:
*   **Test Date:** The Online Assessment Test (Paper I) is scheduled for **December 20, 2025 (Saturday)**.
*   **Time:** The test will be conducted from 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM (IST).
*   **Mode of Exam:** This will be an online examination, accessible through the ICAI Digital Learning Hub.
*   **Format:** The assessment will consist of 100 Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs) for 100 Marks, covering all chapters of the syllabus.
*   **Important Requirement:** Candidates must complete their Face Authentication process at least two days prior to the examination date. No extensions will be granted for this, so ensure timely completion.
*   **Organizing Committee:** This test is organized by the Committee on Financial Markets and Investors' Protection of ICAI.

Members appearing for the test must ensure they have an active ICAI Membership Number, minimum 75% attendance in professional training, a stable internet connection, a functional camera, and active login access to the ICAI Digital Learning Hub using their SSP credentials.
